name: In the Matter of Robert B. HULNICK, Jr. Petition for Reinstatement

parties: In the Matter of Robert B. HULNICK, Jr. Petition for Reinstatement.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 18th day of December, 2003, upon consideration of the Report and Recommendations of the Disciplinary Board of the Supreme Court of Pennsylvania dated October 2, 2003, the Petition for Reinstatement is GRANTED.
Pursuant to Rule 218(e), Pa.R.D.E., petitioner is directed to pay the expenses incurred by the Board in the investigation and processing of the Petition for Reinstatement.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
841 A.2d 1030
In the Matter of Robert B. HULNICK, Jr. Petition for Reinstatement.
No. 980 Disciplinary Docket No. 2.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 18, 2003.
